newsArray.title: IND vs SL: India's Predicted Playing 11 For 1st ODI Against Sri Lanka In Colombo
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: India and Sri Lanka are set to face off in the three-match ODI series following a one-sided T20I series that saw India winning 3-0 under the leadership of Suryakumar Yadav. The first IND vs SL ODI match will take place at the R. Premadasa International Cricket Stadium in Colombo on August 2. Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are set to don the blue jersey for India for the first time since their retirement from the T20I format after India’s T20 World Cup 2024 win. This will also mark new Team India Head Coach Gautam Gambhir’s first ODI assignment. Moreover, veteran Rohit Sharma is set to be back in action as India skipper in the ODI series. Ahead of the India vs Sri Lanka 1st ODI, let's look at India's predicted playing 11 for the match.ALSO ON ABP Live | Angela Carini Abandons Olympic 2024 Boxing Bout After 46 Seconds Against Imane Khelif, Who Failed Gender Test EarlierIndia's Predicted Playing 11 For IND vs SL 1st ODIRohit Sharma (C): As captain for the India vs Sri Lanka ODI series, Sharma will lead the team and open the innings. He holds an exceptional record against Sri Lanka, including two double centuries.Shubman Gill: Shubman gill is expected to open the innings with Sharma in the first ODI.Virat Kohli: Returning to his number three position after opening in the ICC T20 World Cup 2024, Kohli will look to resume his anchoring responsibilities.Shreyas Iyer: Iyer, who has excelled in ODIs and Tests despite losing his place in T20Is, will bat at number four.KL Rahul: Rahul is expected to slot in at number five and will strengthen the middle order.Rishabh Pant (wk): Fit to take the wicketkeeping role, Pant impressed with a 49-run knock in a T20I against Sri Lanka and will look to replicate that.Axar Patel: A valuable spin all-rounder, Patel has shown his capability with both bat and ball in the T20I series and is expected to do the same in the ODIs.Kuldeep Yadav: Expected to lead India’s spin attack, Yadav is anticipated to be there in the 11 as well.Mohammed Siraj: With a strong record against Sri Lanka, Siraj remains a crucial part of the bowling lineup.Arshdeep Singh: Left-arm pacer, Singh was effective in the T20I series, claiming 4 wickets in 2 games and is expected to continue that form in the ODIs as well.Khaleel Ahmed: Another left-arm seamer, Ahmed could benefit from the conditions in Sri Lanka. He played one T20I but did not take any wickets.

newsArray.title: 'It's all about team support': IOA chief PT Usha on Indian shooters' performance at Paris Games | Exclusive
newsArray.description: Swapnil Kusale scripted history with a bronze medal in the men's shooting event at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday. Kusale became the first-ever Indian to win an Olympic medal in the men's 50m rifle 3 position category as the Indian contingent claimed its third medal at the 33rd Summer Games in Paris.

newsArray.title: IND vs SL: ಭಾರತ- ಲಂಕಾ ಏಕದಿನ ಸರಣಿ; ಮೊದಲ ಪಂದ್ಯ ಯಾವ ಚಾನೆಲ್​ನಲ್ಲಿ ಎಷ್ಟು ಗಂಟೆಗೆ ಆರಂಭ?
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: IND vs SL: ಆಗಸ್ಟ್ 2 ರಿಂದ 7 ರವರೆಗೆ ಕೊಲಂಬೊದಲ್ಲಿ ಮೂರು ಪಂದ್ಯಗಳ ಏಕದಿನ ಸರಣಿ ನಡೆಯಲಿದೆ. ಟಿ20 ವಿಶ್ವಕಪ್ ಗೆದ್ದ ನಂತರ ಟಿ20 ಮಾದರಿಯಿಂದ ನಿವೃತ್ತಿಯಾಗಿರುವ ನಾಯಕ ರೋಹಿತ್ ಶರ್ಮಾ ಮತ್ತು ವಿರಾಟ್ ಕೊಹ್ಲಿ ಕೂಡ ಈ ಸರಣಿಯಿಂದ ಮೈದಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಮರಳಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ರೋಹಿತ್ ನಾಯಕತ್ವದಲ್ಲಿ ತಂಡವು ಮೈದಾನಕ್ಕಿಳಿಯಲಿದ್ದು, ಇದರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಚಾಂಪಿಯನ್ಸ್ ಟ್ರೋಫಿ 2025ಕ್ಕೆ ಟೀಂ ಇಂಡಿಯಾದ ತಯಾರಿಯೂ ಆರಂಭವಾಗಲಿದೆ.

newsArray.title: 'It's all about team support': IOA chief PT Usha on Indian shooters' performance at Paris Games | Exclusive
newsArray.description: Swapnil Kusale scripted history with a bronze medal in the men's shooting event at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday. Kusale became the first-ever Indian to win an Olympic medal in the men's 50m rifle 3 position category as the Indian contingent claimed its third medal at the 33rd Summer Games in Paris.

newsArray.title: IND vs SL: ಭಾರತ- ಲಂಕಾ ಏಕದಿನ ಸರಣಿ; ಮೊದಲ ಪಂದ್ಯ ಯಾವ ಚಾನೆಲ್​ನಲ್ಲಿ ಎಷ್ಟು ಗಂಟೆಗೆ ಆರಂಭ?
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: IND vs SL: ಆಗಸ್ಟ್ 2 ರಿಂದ 7 ರವರೆಗೆ ಕೊಲಂಬೊದಲ್ಲಿ ಮೂರು ಪಂದ್ಯಗಳ ಏಕದಿನ ಸರಣಿ ನಡೆಯಲಿದೆ. ಟಿ20 ವಿಶ್ವಕಪ್ ಗೆದ್ದ ನಂತರ ಟಿ20 ಮಾದರಿಯಿಂದ ನಿವೃತ್ತಿಯಾಗಿರುವ ನಾಯಕ ರೋಹಿತ್ ಶರ್ಮಾ ಮತ್ತು ವಿರಾಟ್ ಕೊಹ್ಲಿ ಕೂಡ ಈ ಸರಣಿಯಿಂದ ಮೈದಾನಕ್ಕೆ ಮರಳಲಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ರೋಹಿತ್ ನಾಯಕತ್ವದಲ್ಲಿ ತಂಡವು ಮೈದಾನಕ್ಕಿಳಿಯಲಿದ್ದು, ಇದರೊಂದಿಗೆ ಚಾಂಪಿಯನ್ಸ್ ಟ್ರೋಫಿ 2025ಕ್ಕೆ ಟೀಂ ಇಂಡಿಯಾದ ತಯಾರಿಯೂ ಆರಂಭವಾಗಲಿದೆ.
